casebody.data:
Tuesday, April 28, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-760. State ex rel. Estate of Goddard v. Niehaus.

Hamilton App. No. C-970305. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for stay,

*1529IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

Resnick, J., dissents.
